meta.description: Single source of truth for all Bayesian Health feature flag configurations. Edit this file, then run 'node generate.js' to regenerate feature-flags.md and index.html.

products.name: Sepsis
products.description: Early sepsis detection, bundle tracking, and alert system

products.name: Palliative Care
products.description: Palliative care identification and goals-of-care support

general.name: Bundle Tracking
general.description: Enables the sepsis bundle tracking workflow with time-based compliance monitoring

general.name: Fluid Modification (Bayesian UI)
general.description: Fluid contraindication/modification questions surfaced within the Bayesian application UI

general.name: Fluid Modification (EHR Order Set)
general.description: Fluid contraindication data pulled from the EHR order set rather than Bayesian UI

general.name: Investigational Banner
general.description: Displays an investigational use banner across all application screens

general.name: Instructions for Use (IFU)
general.description: Displays IFU documentation link within the application

nurses.name: Nurse Assessment - Provider Escalation Questions
nurses.description: Enables provider escalation questions within the nurse assessment workflow

nurses.name: Nurse Assessment - Auto Writeback to Flowsheet Rows
nurses.description: Automatically writes nurse assessment answers back to EHR flowsheet rows

nurses.name: Nurse Assessment - Auto Writeback as Clinical Note
nurses.description: Writes nurse assessment as a separate clinical note instead of flowsheet rows

nurses.name: Nurse Order Set Enabled
nurses.description: Enables the nurse order set link (e.g., Rapid Response Sepsis Set) within the application

nurses.name: qSOFA
nurses.description: Enables qSOFA scoring driven by nursing assessment

providers.name: Provider Assessment - Auto Flowsheet Writeback
providers.description: Automatically writes provider assessment answers to EHR flowsheet rows

providers.name: Provider Documentation Tab in Treatment Management
providers.description: Enables the provider documentation tab within the treatment management view

providers.name: Provider - Fluid Documentation Questions
providers.description: Enables fluid documentation questions in the provider assessment workflow

providers.name: Create a New Note Button
providers.description: Enables the Create New Note button for providers to generate a clinical note

providers.name: Add to Existing Note Button
providers.description: Enables the Add to Existing Note button to append to an open note

providers.name: Automatic Flowsheet Writeback of Note Type
providers.description: Automatically writes back the note type answer to a flowsheet row

providers.name: Focused Exam Writeback to Flowsheet Row
providers.description: Writes focused exam data back to EHR flowsheet rows

providers.name: Focused Exam Read from Flowsheet
providers.description: Reads focused exam data from existing EHR flowsheet values

providers.name: Provider Order Set Enabled
providers.description: Enables the provider order set link within the bundle tracking page

providers.name: Bundle Start Time by Provider Trigger
providers.description: Bundle timer starts when the provider triggers the order set

providers.name: Ideal Body Weight Calculation
providers.description: Auto-calculates IBW in Bayesian for fluid contraindication when BMI > 30

providers.name: Auto-Selection of Obesity Contraindication
providers.description: Automatically selects obesity fluid contraindication when IBW criteria are met
